text:
In design tools: is anyone else seeing inconsistency with revision date info and dependents?

For example, the first time you check revision history for a file, it shows 0 revisions with no log, but if you check again, then it shows the correct history.

Also, for dependents, it shows there are dependents without showing the list, even after trying more than one time.
<@UD53A9UUR> any insight if this is a known issue?
not heard of it, but will check around!
